text: The Brock Railroad was a wholly owned subsidiary of the Warren Car Company of Warren, PA. The business entity Brock Railroad Company was created with the Pennsylvania Department of State on February 17, 1982. Pennsylvania Department of State. (2008). Search for Brock Railroad Company. Retrieved November 28, 2008 from https://www.corporations.state.pa.us/corp/soskb/Corp.asp?518863 ==References== Category:Defunct Pennsylvania railroads
title: Brock Railroad
